title: “Sheer lunacy”: Watch what these Michigan auto workers think of their union endorsing Kamala Harris

All of a sudden, Progressives are jumping back on the color-blind train as if they have not dedicated the past several years to demanding society take a colored worldview. And for the side that thinks a certain skin color makes someone less competent to get jobs, they really have some nerve pretending as if they are not beholden to DEI.

title: Simone Biles takes nasty cheap shot at Donald Trump over "black jobs"
